name: Neural Command Web
text:
During its activation, this model can spike to use Neural Command Web. When it does so, choose one of the following effects:
Battle Matrix: While within 10" of this model, other friendly models gain +1 Power Die on their attack rolls. Battle Matrix expires at the start of this model's next activation.
Field Promotion: Choose a friendly squad model within 10" of this model. Replace the target model with an equal- or smaller-base-sized solo from your reserves. The replaced model is destroyed.
Impulse Agitator: Choose a friendly non-vehicle unit within 10" of this model. That unit can immediately move up to its SPD.
